annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle for the final time to end this match.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 3 min. of stoppage time to be played.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Juan Martinez Munuera shows the yellow card to Gerard Pique (Barcelona) for a heavy challenge.

annotations.label: attendance
annotations.description: The attendance is 81704.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: A substitution has been made. David Zurutuza is replaced by Esteban Granero (Real Sociedad).

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) will take a corner kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The referee awards a corner and Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) goes over to take it.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) takes the corner.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Denis Suarez (Barcelona) will replace Alcacer Paco.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Eusebio Sacristan has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Bautista Orgilles Jon (Real Sociedad) replacing Da Silva Willian Jose.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) sends the corner into the box, but Geronimo Rulli intercepts it and averts the threat.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Sergio Canales (Real Sociedad) goes over to take a corner kick after one of the defenders makes a good clearance.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Nothing comes of the resulting corner from Mikel Oyarzabal (Real Sociedad). The defence is alert and manages to cut it out.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Here is a change. Andre Gomes is going off and Luis Enrique gives the last tactical orders to Andres Iniesta (Barcelona).

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Luis Suarez (Barcelona) sees a yellow! His tackle wasn't that harsh, but he probably talked himself into Juan Martinez Munuera's book.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee allows time for a substitution. Carlos Vela will be replaced by Sergio Canales (Real Sociedad).

annotations.label: funfact
annotations.description: 16:14 – this is the total number of shots produced by both teams.
Barcelona hold the ball and display nice passing from player to player.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: It's like he was asking for a caution. Asier Illarramendi (Real Sociedad) receives a yellow card.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The half time break is over and the second half is about to start.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Juan Martinez Munuera has ended the first half by blowing the whistle.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Xabi Prieto (Real Sociedad) meets a perfect cross from Da Silva Willian Jose deep inside the box and controls it with a nice first touch. He produces an accurate strike inside the right post. The score is 3:2.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 1 min. of added time.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: GOAL! Superb work from Lionel Messi, who plays a vital role in the build up. He squares it to Alcacer Paco (Barcelona), who beats Geronimo Rulli with a brilliant shot into the right side of the net. 3:1.
Barcelona keep the ball and are displaying some tiki taka style passing at the moment.

annotations.label: soccer-ball-own
annotations.description: Samuel Umtiti (Barcelona) scores an unfortunate own goal after deflecting the ball into his own net!

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Alcacer Paco (Barcelona) is awarded a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to agree with the decision, but Juan Martinez Munuera ignores the protests.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Luis Suarez fires in a promising shot which ricochets off the goalkeeper back to Lionel Messi (Barcelona) inside the box and he sends the ball into the back of the net. The score is 2:0.
Andre Gomes (Barcelona) produces an effort from the edge of the box, but doesn't hit the ball properly and sends it yards over the bar.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The corner from Carlos Vela (Real Sociedad) is hurriedly cleared.
Mikel Oyarzabal (Real Sociedad) unleashes a shot, but it just misses the left hand post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) takes the corner kick but the ball only finds the head of an opponent.

What a goal scoring opportunity! Luis Suarez (Barcelona) makes a good run into the box to meet a cross and fires the ball in on goal, but the shot is amazingly blocked by a defender. The ball goes out of play. Barcelona are awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Luis Suarez passes to Lionel Messi (Barcelona), who collects the ball and unleashes a terrific shot from the edge of the box. His effort goes inside the right post. Fabulous goal! The score is 1:0.
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) attempts to find one of his teammates, but puts far too much on the pass and the chance is gone.

Mikel Oyarzabal (Real Sociedad) blows a clear opportunity to score a goal. He was one on one with Marc Andre ter Stegen inside the six yard box and attempted to put the ball into the middle of the target, but was denied by a great save.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) swings in the corner, but it's comfortably cleared away.
Sergi Roberto (Barcelona) dribbles into the box, but Geronimo Rulli is quick enough to come off his line and stop him. The referee signals a corner kick to Barcelona.
Yuri Berchiche (Real Sociedad) gets a shot away from distance, but wasn't really set to take it and fires high and wide.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Carlos Vela (Real Sociedad) sees a yellow card from Juan Martinez Munuera after he sent one of the opposing players to the ground.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) sees an unmarked teammate and attempts to send him a low pass. However, one of the defenders reads the game perfectly and averts the danger.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Here we go, today's match is starting right now.
The players are out at last! Real Sociedad will take the kick off.
Juan Martinez Munuera will officiate today.

annotations.label: lineup1
annotations.description: The starting lineups for this match have been revealed.
Welcome to our live text commentary, ladies and gentleman! The starting lineups will be announced very soon, so just sit back and get ready to enjoy the action.
The last 5 games between these two teams have been goal rich, with an average of 3.0 goals per game.
Barcelona have gone 12 consecutive matches without a draw.
Lionel Messi has already scored 27 goals and he is the top goal scorer for Barcelona in the competition.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle for the final time to end this match.
